item.description:
Stephanie is hosting a meetup at the Folk and Furfest at the Wampatuck State Park in Hingham put on by the Standish Humane Society. Please check out the website re fees, events, etc.
Stephanie will be there at 10:30am and you can say hello to Elizabeth at the registration desk. Both links are below.



http://www.standishhu...
http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.how_to_find_us: Stephanie will be wearing a salmon colored T shirt and a red hat with white dog logo on them and she will have 2 white dogs with her.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Folk and Furfest
